name: SHO.ai BrandOS Controller
description:
The SHO.ai BrandOS Controller helps marketing and design teams create on-brand assets in seconds. Save hours on asset creation and accelerate your marketing workflow. A/B testing your vision is now easier than ever.


Connect your SHO BrandOS URL and Magic - all of your assets can now look and feel like your brand. 

Select a template to edit or download.


Everything your brand needs from social media assets to newsletters, business cards, email signatures, branded collaterals and even social media profile banners.


Activate your Brand.

www.SHO.ai
